The planet isn't in any danger.  In fact, it would be better off without us.  It is our civilization that is in danger and there is already enough global warming baked in to collapse our civilization.  Preventing that will require the world's governments to work together without monetary constraints.  That isn't going to happen.  What you guys are planning won't put a dent in climate change but it may be still helpful because we may all need to learn to live without any infrastructure soon enough.  Best of luck!
